quote:
Obamacare covers very few people.

And remember, deduct from the number all of the people that had great health care that they loved, that was taken away from them; was taken away from them.
quotePlain:
Obamacare covers very few people.
And remember, deduct from the number all of the people that had great health care that they loved, that was taken away from them; was taken away from them.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: More than 20 million people are covered by the two major components of former President Barack Obama’s health care law: expanded Medicaid and subsidized private health insurance.
checks.quotePlain: More than 20 million people are covered by the two major components of former President Barack Obama’s health care law: expanded Medicaid and subsidized private health insurance.

claims.title: Obamacare covers very few people
claims.truth: About 20 million have gained insurance under the act.
claims.truthPlain: About 20 million have gained insurance under the act.
